00132 /* BUGAZOMEU: /!\ Free is used as 'Mem_Free'. BuddyMalloc stuff is to be put here */
00133 #define Free(a ) Mem_Free( a )
00134 
00150 int mnt_Export( nfs_arg_t            * parg    /* IN     */,
00151                 exportlist_t         * pexport /* IN     */,
00152                 fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext   /* IN     */,
00153                 cache_inode_client_t * pclient /* INOUT  */,
00154                 hash_table_t         * ht      /* INOUT  */, 
00155                 struct svc_req       * preq    /* IN     */,
00156                 nfs_res_t            * pres    /* OUT    */ ) 
00157 {  
00158   
00159   /* @todo : memset after Mem_Alloc */
00160     
00161   exportlist_t * p_current_item = pexport ; /* the current export item. */
00162   
00163   exports  p_exp_out = NULL;     /* Pointer to the first export entry. */
00164   exports  p_exp_current = NULL; /* Pointer to the last  export entry. */
00165   
00166   unsigned int i ;
00167   int          rc;
00168       
00169   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "REQUEST PROCESSING: Calling mnt_Export" ) ;
00170   
00171   /* paranoid command, to avoid parasites in the result structure. */
00172   memset(pres, 0, sizeof(nfs_res_t));
00173   
00174   /* for each existing export entry */
00175   while( p_current_item ){
00176     
00177     exports new_expnode; /* the export node to be added to the list */
00178     char * export_path;
00179     int buffsize;
00180     
00181     new_expnode = (exports)Mem_Alloc(sizeof(exportnode));
00182     
00183     /* paranoid command, to avoid parasites in the structure. */
00184     memset(new_expnode, 0, sizeof(exportnode));
00185     
00186     
00187     /* ---- ex_dir ------ */
00188     
00189     /* we set the export path */
00190     
00191     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG,
00192                       "MNT_EXPORT: Export entry: %s | Numclients: %d | PtrClients: %p",
00193                        p_current_item->fullpath, p_current_item->clients.num_clients,
00194                        p_current_item->clients.clientarray );
00195     
00196     buffsize = strlen(p_current_item->fullpath) + 1;
00197     
00198     new_expnode->ex_dir = Mem_Alloc(buffsize);
00199 
00200     /* Buffers Init */
00201     memset(new_expnode->ex_dir, 0, buffsize);
00202 
00203     strncpy(new_expnode->ex_dir,p_current_item->fullpath,buffsize);        
00204     
00205     
00206     /* ---- ex_groups ---- */
00207     
00208     /* we convert the group list */
00209 
00210     if( p_current_item->clients.num_clients > 0 )
00211       {
00212         
00213         /* Alias, to make the code slim... */
00214         exportlist_client_t * p_clients = &(p_current_item->clients);
00215         
00216         /* allocates the memory for all the groups, once for all */
00217         new_expnode->ex_groups = (groups)Mem_Alloc( p_clients->num_clients * sizeof(groupnode));
00218         
00219         /* paranoid command, to avoid parasites in the allocated strcuture. */
00220         memset(new_expnode->ex_groups, 0, p_clients->num_clients * sizeof(groupnode));    
00221         
00222         
00223         for ( i=0; i< p_clients->num_clients; i++)
00224           { 
00225             char * group_name;
00226             
00227             
00228             /* ---- gr_next ----- */
00229             
00230             if ((i+1)==p_clients->num_clients) /* this is the last item */
00231               new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_next = NULL;
00232             else /* other items point to the next memory slot */
00233               new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_next = &(new_expnode->ex_groups[i+1]);
00234             
00235             /* ---- gr_name ----- */
00236             
00237             switch( p_clients->clientarray[i].type )
00238               {
00239               case HOSTIF_CLIENT:
00240                 
00241                 /* allocates target buffer (+1 for security )*/
00242                 new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name = Mem_Alloc( INET_ADDRSTRLEN + 1 );
00243                 
00244                 
00245                 /* clears memory : */
00246                 memset( new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, 0, INET_ADDRSTRLEN + 1 );
00247                 if( inet_ntop( AF_INET, &(p_clients->clientarray[i].client.hostif.clientaddr),
00248                                  new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name,INET_ADDRSTRLEN)  == NULL )
00249                   {    
00250                     strncpy(new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, "Invalid Host address", MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00251                   }
00252                 
00253                 break;
00254                 
00255               case NETWORK_CLIENT:
00256                 
00257                 /* allocates target buffer (+1 for security )*/
00258                 new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name = Mem_Alloc( INET_ADDRSTRLEN + 1 );
00259                 
00260                 
00261                 /* clears memory : */
00262                 memset( new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, 0, INET_ADDRSTRLEN + 1 );
00263                 if( inet_ntop( AF_INET, &(p_clients->clientarray[i].client.network.netaddr),
00264                                       new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name,INET_ADDRSTRLEN) == NULL )
00265                   {
00266                     strncpy(new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, "Invalid Network address", MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00267                   }
00268                 
00269                 break;
00270                 
00271               case NETGROUP_CLIENT:
00272                 
00273                 /* allocates target buffer */
00274                 
00275                 new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name = Mem_Alloc(MAXHOSTNAMELEN);
00276                 
00277                 /* clears memory : */
00278                 memset( new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, 0, MAXHOSTNAMELEN );    
00279                 
00280                 strncpy(new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name,
00281                         p_clients->clientarray[i].client.netgroup.netgroupname,MAXHOSTNAMELEN);
00282                 
00283                 break;
00284                 
00285               case WILDCARDHOST_CLIENT:
00286                 
00287                 /* allocates target buffer */
00288                 new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name = Mem_Alloc(MAXHOSTNAMELEN);
00289                 
00290                 /* clears memory : */
00291                 memset( new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, 0, MAXHOSTNAMELEN );    
00292                 
00293                 strncpy(new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name,
00294                         p_clients->clientarray[i].client.wildcard.wildcard,MAXHOSTNAMELEN);
00295                 break;            
00296                 
00297               case GSSPRINCIPAL_CLIENT:
00298                 
00299                 new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name = Mem_Alloc(MAXHOSTNAMELEN);
00300                 
00301                 /* clears memory : */
00302                 memset( new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name, 0, MAXHOSTNAMELEN );    
00303                 
00304                 strncpy(new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name,
00305                         p_clients->clientarray[i].client.gssprinc.princname,MAXHOSTNAMELEN);
00306                 
00307                 break;                        
00308                 
00309               default :              
00310                 
00311                 /* Mem_Free resources and returns an error. */ 
00312                 
00313                 /* @todo : Mem_Free allocated resources*/
00314                 
00315                 DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT, "MNT_EXPORT: Unknown export entry type: %d",
00316                                  p_clients->clientarray[i].type);
00317                 
00318                 new_expnode->ex_groups[i].gr_name = NULL;
00319                 
00320                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00321               }
00322             
00323           }
00324         
00325       }
00326     else 
00327       {
00328         /* There are no groups for this export entry. */
00329         new_expnode->ex_groups = NULL;
00330         
00331       }
00332     
00333     
00334     /* ---- ex_next ----- */
00335     
00336     /* this is the last item in the list */
00337     
00338     new_expnode->ex_next = NULL;
00339     
00340     /* we insert the export node to the export list */
00341     
00342     if (p_exp_out)
00343       {
00344         p_exp_current->ex_next = new_expnode;
00345         p_exp_current = new_expnode;
00346       } 
00347     else 
00348       {
00349         /* This is the first item in the list */
00350         p_exp_out = new_expnode;
00351         p_exp_current = new_expnode;
00352       }
00353     
00354     p_current_item = (exportlist_t *)(p_current_item->next);
00355     
00356   }
00357   
00358   
00359   /* return the pointer to the export list */
00360   
00361   pres->res_mntexport = p_exp_out ;
00362   
00363   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00364   
00365 } /* mnt_Export */
00366 
00375 void mnt_Export_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00376 {
00377   
00381   return ;
00382 } /* mnt_Export_Free */
